title: SHOW 121 - Ian Murray (Election Special #9)
itunes:title: SHOW 121 - Ian Murray (Election Special #9)
itunes:subtitle: Ian Murray has held Edinburgh South for Labour si…
description:
Ian Murray has held Edinburgh South for Labour since 2010. In 2015 he was the only Labour MP left in Scotland. He tells Matt about the changing nature of Scottish politics, the difficulties Labour face in this election, his personal battle to remain as Labour’s candidate and why the red jackets he wears out campaigning have confused some constituents... Follow Ian on Twitter: @IanMurrayMP Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde Email your funny campaign stories to politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com Sign up to Matt's mailing list for free treats and goodies: http://mattforde.com/mailing-list

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
